Generated Narrative: SearchParameter MedicationRequest-medication

MedicationRequestmedicationSearchParameter

Parameter medication:reference

Searches for MedicationRequest by medication reference eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/MedicationRequest?medication={reference}

ResourceMedicationRequest
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesMedicationRequest
Multiples
  • multipleAnd: It's up to the server whether the parameter may repeat in order to specify multiple values that must all be true
  • multipleOr: It's up to the server whether the parameter can have multiple values (separated by comma) where at least one must be true
